name: Heart-Eyes
description: A smiling face with hearts for eyes

name: Elf
description: A creature with pointed ears and a human-like face

name: Lion
description: The face of a lion in a cute, cartoon style

name: Badger
description: The body of a badger, sometimes associated with a honeybadger.
usages: Little concern for threats or FUD

name: DNA
usages: Evoking the process of life and evolution

name: Pirate Flag
description: A skull-and-crossbones on a black flag (AKA "The Jolly Rodger").

name: Magnet
description: A horseshoe-shaped magnet with a red handle and silver tips.

name: Chess Pawn
description: A piece used a pawn in the game of chess

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A symbol of a high-voltage electrical charge.
